article.title: Search for intermediate mass black hole binaries in the first observing run of Advanced LIGO

multiple_choice_question.text: What does Figure 1 primarily illustrate regarding IMBHB searches?
choices: The exact reach of modeled IMBHB searches.
A comparison of sensitivity for IMBHBs between different LIGO runs.
The effect of matched-filter SNR on horizon distance.
The optimal detection statistic for IMBHB signals.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which IMBHB system, based on the parameters in Table 1, has the lowest 90% confidence combined upper limit on the rate density?
What do the straight dashed lines and curved dotted lines represent in Figure 2?
choices: Dashed lines: Constant total mass; Dotted lines: Constant mass ratio
Dashed lines: Constant mass ratio; Dotted lines: Constant total mass
Dashed lines: Constant spin; Dotted lines: Constant redshift
Dashed lines: Constant redshift; Dotted lines: Constant spin

multiple_choice_question.text: The article discusses converting IMBHB merger rate results into events per GC per Gyr. What GC density is used for this conversion?
